Name: extended-right
Description: Contains extended right-handed layout for android remote buttons

cells.name: remote-button-power-tv
cells.html:
<svg id="tv-power-wire" viewBox="0 0 512 512" width="100" height="120" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" style="height: 100%; width: auto; display: block;">
  <defs>
    <!-- Mask has been removed as we no longer need it for the power icon -->
  </defs>

  <!-- Outer TV shape (stroke only) -->
  <rect 
    x="64" y="96" width="384" height="256" rx="32" ry="32" 
    fill="none" stroke="#bfbfbf" stroke-width="8" />

  <!-- Inner TV screen (transparent, no fill) -->
  <rect 
    x="72" y="104" width="368" height="240" rx="28" ry="28" 
    fill="none" stroke="none" />

  <!-- Power icon as a stroke (same color as TV body) -->
  <g transform="translate(160, 130) scale(3.0)">
    <!-- Left arc -->
    <path d="M 6 34 A 26 26 0 0 1 24 8" stroke="#bfbfbf" stroke-width="6" fill="none" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"/>
    <!-- Right arc -->
    <path d="M 40 8 A 26 26 0 0 1 58 34" stroke="#bfbfbf" stroke-width="6" fill="none" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"/>
    <!-- Bottom arc -->
    <path d="M 58 34 A 26 26 0 0 1 6 34" stroke="#bfbfbf" stroke-width="6" fill="none" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"/>
    <!-- Vertical bar -->
    <line x1="32" y1="0" x2="32" y2="32" stroke="#bfbfbf" stroke-width="6" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"/>
  </g>

  <!-- Stand -->
  <line x1="160" y1="384" x2="352" y2="384" stroke="#bfbfbf" stroke-width="28" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" />

  <!-- Antenna (smaller, reduced by half) -->
  <line x1="192" y1="90" x2="160" y2="40" stroke="#bfbfbf" stroke-width="12" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" />
  <line x1="320" y1="90" x2="352" y2="40" stroke="#bfbfbf" stroke-width="12" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" />
</svg>

cells.name: remote-button-power
cells.html:
<svg id="shield-tv-power" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" viewBox="0 0 120 120" width="120" height="100" style="height: 100%; width: auto; display: block; transform: scale(0.7, 0.7);">
  <defs>
    <style>
      .cls-1 {
        fill: none;
      }
      .cls-2 {
        clip-path: url(#clip-path);
      }
      .cls-3 {
        fill: #bfbfbf;
      }
    </style>
    <clipPath id="clip-path">
      <rect class="cls-1" x="10.3" y="10.3" width="99.4" height="99.4"/>
    </clipPath>
    <!-- Define the mask with inverted cutout -->
    <mask id="disk-mask-inverted">
      <!-- Entire mask area is white (visible) -->
      <rect width="100%" height="100%" fill="white"/>
      <!-- Black circle in the middle will cut out the content (this will hide the content inside the circle) -->
      <g transform="rotate(-80 60 60) translate(41.5, 42.5)  scale(0.55)">
        <!-- Left arc -->
        <path d="M 6 34 A 26 26 0 0 1 24 8" stroke="black" stroke-width="10" fill="none" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"/>
        <!-- Right arc -->
        <path d="M 40 8 A 26 26 0 0 1 58 34" stroke="black" stroke-width="10" fill="none" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"/>
        <!-- Bottom arc -->
        <path d="M 58 34 A 26 26 0 0 1 6 34" stroke="black" stroke-width="10" fill="none" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"/>
        <!-- Vertical bar -->
        <line x1="32" y1="0" x2="32" y2="32" stroke="black" stroke-width="10" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"/>
      </g>
    </mask>
  </defs>
  <g id="diamond_guide" data-name="diamond guide" transform="translate(40, -55) rotate(80 60 60) scale(1.8)" mask="url(#disk-mask-inverted)">
    <g id="m48-nvidia-shield">
      <g class="cls-2">
        <g class="cls-2">
          <path class="cls-3" d="M34.11,100.38H85.89V19.62H34.11ZM72.05,40,39.14,21.69H83ZM71,41.73,36.18,95.82V22.41ZM48.13,81.08,80.68,98.31H37Zm1.12-1.75L72.79,42.7l11,5.51V97.63ZM83.81,45.9l-9.92-5,9.92-16.55Zm-3.15-6.61h.22a1.26,1.26,0,0,1-.87.92,1.57,1.57,0,0,1-.44-.92h.24a.69.69,0,0,0,.24.54,1,1,0,0,0,.61-.54m-2,0V36.35h3.1v2.94h-.36a1.21,1.21,0,0,0,0-.19,4.72,4.72,0,0,0-.78-2.4c-.08.08-.25.45-.32.54a2.84,2.84,0,0,1,.86,1.87,1.09,1.09,0,0,1,0,.18h-.26a1.49,1.49,0,0,0,0-.21,2.66,2.66,0,0,0-1-1.63,2.35,2.35,0,0,0-.88,1.76v.08Zm.93,0h-.29v-.08a1.69,1.69,0,0,1,.66-1.27s.76.54.76,1.13a.78.78,0,0,1,0,.22h-.85c0-.3.17-.36.47-.54l-.34-.4a1.05,1.05,0,0,0-.39.79.77.77,0,0,0,0,.15m1.57,0h.24A2.24,2.24,0,0,1,79.93,41a3.26,3.26,0,0,1-.87-1.75h.22a1.77,1.77,0,0,0,.7,1.27,1.71,1.71,0,0,0,1.16-1.27"/>
        </g>
      </g>
    </g>
  </g>
  
  <g transform="translate(28, 27) scale(1.0)">
    <!-- Left arc -->
    <path d="M 6 34 A 26 26 0 0 1 24 8" stroke="#bfbfbf" stroke-width="6" fill="none" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"/>
    <!-- Right arc -->
    <path d="M 40 8 A 26 26 0 0 1 58 34" stroke="#bfbfbf" stroke-width="6" fill="none" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"/>
    <!-- Bottom arc -->
    <path d="M 58 34 A 26 26 0 0 1 6 34" stroke="#bfbfbf" stroke-width="6" fill="none" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"/>
    <!-- Vertical bar -->
    <line x1="32" y1="0" x2="32" y2="32" stroke="#bfbfbf" stroke-width="6" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"/>
  </g>
</svg>
